job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Who you will work with

   The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - Gen AI

Who you will work with

   The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very high-level and focuses on team collaboration and general engineering guilds. It lacks specific technical details about tasks, models, or technologies required for ML or GenAI engineering roles. Therefore, it's difficult to classify definitively.

phrases: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a focus on understanding business needs and aligning AI solutions with business objectives to deliver value.

phrases: a small group of software and machine learning professionals
job_tasks.justification: Mentions 'software professionals' which implies software development is part of the team's function, though not detailed.
The term 'machine learning professionals' suggests involvement in the operational aspects of ML, though not explicitly detailed.

phrases: The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager
You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist
together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day
you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other
Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa
soft_skills.justification: The description heavily emphasizes teamwork, collaboration with data scientists and software professionals, and participation in a broader engineering guild for knowledge exchange.

phrases: exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on learning from peers and accelerating career growth implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'innovate' and 'deliver maximum value' suggests a proactive and ownership-oriented approach to problem-solving and solution delivery.
